item.description: US-87 north at FM-296. Use FM-296 east to Boise City (Oklahoma).

item.description: Texline City Limit on US-87 south. Texline is right on the New Mexico - Texas line.

item.description: Welcome To Texas on US-87 south. Taken at the New Mexico - Texas state line.

item.title: TX-601 Spur East - Exit 22
item.description: TX-601 Spur east at Exit 22 - Sargent Major Blvd./Airport Road.

item.description: TX-601 Spur east at Exit 21 - Chaffee/Fred Wilson.

item.title: TX-601 Spur East Approaching Exits 21 and 22
item.description: TX-601 Spur east approaching Exit 21 - Chaffee/Fred Wilson and Exit 22 - Airport Road/Sargent Major Blvd. Use Exit 21 for Fort Bliss National Cemetery.

item.title: US-54 North at TX-601 Spur
item.description: US-54 north at TX-601 Spur onramp. There is a freeway to freeway connection between US-54 and TX-601, but the author took the ramp from US-54 to a surface street which turns into TX-601.

item.title: I-10 East - I-110/US-54 Jct.
item.description: I-10 east at I-110/US-54 ramps. Use left lane for US-54 East/Alamogordo/Ft. Bliss; use right lane for (I-110 South/US-54 West)Juarez Mexico. Notice that firearms are prohibited in Mexico.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 22B
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 22B - US-54/Patriot Freeway/Alamogordo (NM)/Fort Bliss/Juarez (Mexico). Continue east on I-10 for San Antonio and Van Horn.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 22A
item.description: I-10 East at Exit 22A - TX-478 Loop/Copia St. For the Chamizal Coliseum use Exit 22B (I-110).

item.title: I-10 East - Exits 22A and 22B
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 22A - TX-478 Loop/Copia St. Approaching Exit 22B - US-54/Alamogordo (NM)/Fort Bliss/Juarez (Mexico). Continue east on I-10 for San Antonio and Van Horn.

item.title: I-10 East Approaching Exit 12
item.description: I-10 east approaching Exit 12 - US-85/Sunland Park Drive/Paisano Drive.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 11
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 11 - TX-20/Mesa St. Next exits are - US-85/Sunland Park Drive/Paisano Drive and Executive Center Blvd.

item.title: I-10 East Approaching Exit 6
item.description: I-10 east approaching Exit 6 - TX-375 Loop/Talbot Ave/Transmountain Road. This is the the northwestern end of the TX-375 Loop, which crosses the Franklin Mountains, and loops around Fort Bliss, before turning into the Border Freeway.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 5
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 5 - Check Station.

item.title: I-10 East - El Paso City Limit
item.description: Entering El Paso, Texas on I-10 east.

item.title: TX-37 Spur West at I-10 Onramp
item.description: TX-37 Spur West at I-10/US-180 East/US-85 South. This is the onramp for Exit 2 on I-10. In the background of the photo is the city limit sign for the Village of Vinton.

item.title: TX-37 Spur East at I-10 West
item.description: TX-37 Spur east at I-10/US-180 West/US-85 North. This is the onramp for I-10 Exit 2.

item.title: I-10 East at TX-37 Spur
item.description: I-10 East, Exit 2 offramp at TX-37 Spur. Turn left on TX-37 Spur for Westway; turn right on TX-37 Spur for Vinton. Continue ahead for I-10.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 2
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 2 - TX-37 Spur/Vinton Road/Westway Drive.

item.title: FM-1905 East at TX-6 Spur
item.description: FM-1905 east at TX-6 Spur. Turn right for TX-6 Spur, continue ahead on FM-1905 for I-10.

item.title: TX-20 West at FM-1905
item.description: TX-20 west at FM-1905 junction in Anthony, TX.

item.title: TX-20 West at FM-1905
item.description: TX-20 west at FM-1905 junction. FM-1905 joins TX-20 west for a few blocks through Anthony. Use FM-1905 east for I-10.

item.title: TX-20 West - Anthony
item.description: TX-20 west in Anthony, Texas.

item.title: I-10 East - Distance Marker
item.description: First distance marker along I-10 east in Texas. Distance to El Paso and Beaumont. Beaumont is at the opposite side of Texas on the Louisiana state line - 852 miles away.

item.title: I-10 East - Welcome To Texas
item.description: Welcome to Texas on I-10 east. Taken about 1 mile east of the Texas/New Mexico State Line.

item.title: I-10 East - Rest Area and Welcome Center
item.description: I-10 east at Rest Area/Tourist Welcome Center just east of the New Mexico/Texas State Line.

item.description: I-10 west at Exit 28A - FM-2316/McRae Blvd./Viscount Blvd. Approaching Hawkins Blvd. and Airways Blvd.

item.description: I-10 west at Exit 28B - Yarbrough Drive/Sumac Drive. Approaching Exit 28A - FM-2316/McRae Blvd./Viscount Blvd.

item.description: I-10 west at Exit 34 - Loop 375/Joe Battle Blvd./Americas Ave. Exit 34 is currently closed due to construction.

item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 34 - TX-375 Loop/Americas Ave./Joe Battle Blvd. This is the eastern edge of TX-375 Loop which encircles the city of El Paso.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 34
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 34 - FM-659/Zaragoza road/George Dieter Drive. The FM-659 shield is incorrectly signed as TX-659. Zaragoza Road connects I-10 to the Zaragoza International Bridge into Mexico.

item.description: I-10 west at Exit 35 - Eastlake Blvd.

item.title: I-10 West - Entering Socorro
item.description: Entering Socorro, Texas on I-10 west. This is a non-standard city limit sign, which is brown and contains the city logo. Socorro is an eastern suburb of El Paso.

item.description: I-10 west at Exit 42 - FM-1110/Clint/San Elizario.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 49
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 49 - FM-793/Fabens.

item.description: I-10 west at Exit 55 - Tornillo.

item.title: I-10 West - El Paso County Line
item.description: El Paso County Line on I-10 west. The speed limit on I-10 drops from 80 MPH, to 75 MPH at the county line. A 75 MPH speed limit sign can be seen in the background.

item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 68 - Acala Road.

item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 72 - TX-148 Spur/Ft. Hancock.

item.description: I-10 west at Exit 78 - TX-20/McNary. TX-20 runs between the Rio Grande and I-10 between here and El Paso. Views of the Rio Grande and Mexico can be seen south of the highway through through this area.

item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 80 - TX-20/McNary.

item.description: I-10 west at Exit 81 - FM-2217.

item.description: I-10 West at Exit 85 - Esperanza Road. I-10 enters the Rio Grande Valley near here. I-10 parallels the Rio Grande from here to Las Cruces, NM.

item.description: I-10 west at Exit 88 - FM-34.

item.description: I-10 west with the word Texas in the shield. The only I-10 shields with the state name I saw were in Hudspeth County.

item.description: BL-10 west (Golf Course Dr.) at I-10. Turn right for I-10 west, continue ahead and go under freeway for I-10 east.

item.description: BL-10 (Golf Course Dr.) at I-10. Turn right for I-10 west to El Paso; left for I-10 east to San Antonio.

item.description: BL-10 west at I-10 jct. Turn left for I-10 east; continue straight ahead for I-10 west.

item.description: BL-10 West/TX-54 south (Broadway) at Van Horn St. Turn left for TX-54 south (to) US-90 east. This is the western terminus of US-90.

item.description: TX-54 south at BL-10/To US-90. Turn left for BL-10 West, turn right for BL-10 East/TX-54 South, to US-90.

item.description: TX-54 south approaching FM-2185.

item.description: Van Horn City Limit - Pop. 2500. Taken on TX-54 south. Van Horn is the county seat of Culberson County.

item.description: Distance marker on TX-54 south. Distance to Van Horn and Marfa (via US-90).

item.title: TX-54 South - Texas Mountain Trail
item.description: Texas Mountain Trail sign on TX-54 south. This part of Texas is the Texas Mountain Trail region, of the Texas Heritage Trails program.

item.description: US-180/US-62 west at TX-54 junction.

item.description: TX-18 south at TX-302. TX-302 is a truck route through Kermit.

item.description: TX-18 south at TX-302. Use TX-302 east for Odessa; TX-302 west for Mentone.

item.description: TX-18 South/TX-115 West at TX-18/TX-115 Split. Turn left for TX-18 south to Monahans; continue straight for TX-115 east to Andrews.

item.description: TX-18 south at TX-115. Turn left for TX-18 South/TX-115 East; turn right for TX-115 West.

item.description: TX-18 south at TX-115. Turn right on TX-115 west for Wink; left on TX-115 west/TX-18 south for Monahans. TX-18 joins TX-115 for a few blocks through Kermit.

item.description: TX-18 south approaching TX-115. Turn left to continue south on TX-18.

item.description: Texas State Line on TX-18 south. In the background is the first TX-18 shield, Winkler County Line, and larger Texas welcome sign. Taken at the New Mexico state line.

item.title: US-62/US-180 East - Texas State Line
item.description: Texas State Line on US-62/US-180 East. Entering Gaines County. Also entering Central Time Zone, although that sign is a few yards down.

item.title: US-54 North at State Line Road
item.description: US-54 north at State Line Road west to Chaparral (New Mexico). Continue north on US-54 for Alamogordo (New Mexico). The highway crosses into New Mexico just north of this junction.

item.title: US-54 North at FM-2529
item.description: US-54 north at FM-2529/McCombs St. Turn left on FM-2529 for Chaparral (New Mexico). Continue north on US-54 for Alamogordo (New Mexico).

item.title: US-54 North - Exit 32
item.description: US-54 north at Exit 32 - Sean Haggerty Drive. All traffic must exit the freeway here. The remainder of US-54 north into New Mexico is a divided expressway.

item.title: US-54 North - Exit 31
item.description: US-54 north at Exit 31 - FM-3255/MLK Jr. Blvd./Kenworthy St. Approaching Sean Haggerty Drive exit. The Patriot Freeway ends at Sean Haggerty Drive exit.

item.title: US-54 North - Exit 29
item.description: US-54 north at Exit 29 - TX-375 Loop North/Woodrow Bean Transmountain Drive. This is the northern end of the TX-375 Loop around El Paso. Approaching Sun Valley Drive, FM-3255/MLK Jr. Blvd./Kenworthy St./Sean Haggerty Drive interchanges.

item.title: US-54 North - Exit 26
item.description: US-54 north at Exit 26 - Business US-54/Dyer St./Hercules Ave. Approaching Hondo Pass Road, Diana Drive, and TX-375 Loop/Trans Mountain Woodrow Bean Drive.

item.title: US-54 North - Exit 24B
item.description: US-54 north approaching Exit 24B - TX-601 Spur East. Use TX-601 Spur for the El Paso International Airport.

item.title: I-10 West at I-110/US-54 Ramps
item.description: I-10 west at I-110/US-54 ramps. Merge right for US-54 North/Patriot Freeway/Alamogordo/Fort Bliss. Merge left for (I-110/US-54 South)/Juárez, Mexico. Also use I-110/US-54 south for Chamizal Coliseum. Notice the sign above the Juárez, Mexico signs that shows firearms are not allowed in Mexico.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 22B
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 22B - US-54/Patriot Freeway/Alamogordo/Fort Bliss/Juárez. I-10 continues west to Las Cruces (New Mexico).
